parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the WAF ruleset, which can be obtained by calling the ListWafRulesets interface.

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: The WAF operation phase, specifying the phase of the ruleset to query.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.
